title: Our stake in troubled Morocco

description: Episode of Series "March of Time". Describes the political unrest in French Morocco which threatens to endanger strategic American air bases in the area. Traces the causes of the dissatisfaction to an awakening nationalism in the Muslim world and to resentment of the country's colonial status despite improvements initiated by the French government. Shows the everyday life of the people.
